snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average of 30 stocks rose to a new record this week, but is still below its 2000 and 2007 highs when adjusted for inflation.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average of 30 stocks rose to a new record this week, but is still below its 2000 and 2007 highs when adjusted for inflation.

headline.seo: A Dow Record, if You Ignore Inflation
headline.main: Off the Charts: A Dow Record, if You Ignore Inflation
